content: Only took halfway through the first paragraph before a hack joke about the PB&J trend / an IV bag made me realize this was going to be a “Bad Jason” column and not worth reading. I think most people, including the investors, have comes to terms with The Ringer never realizing its original potential. I guess it just feels harder to “write-down” an individual’s potential, which, back when his Twitter feed/writing were clever and felt fresh, seemed sky high for Concepcion. Miss those days.
